mapper.sql: id, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status, name, parentId, nodeOrder, nodeLevel, menuUrl, code
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO system_menu ( creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status, name, parentId, nodeOrder, nodeLevel, menuUrl, code ) VALUES ( #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{lastModDate}, #{status}, #{name}, #{parentId}, #{nodeOrder}, #{nodeLevel}, #{menuUrl}, #{code} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE system_menu
creator = #{creator},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
status = #{status},
name = #{name},
parentId = #{parentId},
nodeOrder = #{nodeOrder},
nodeLevel = #{nodeLevel},
menuUrl = #{menuUrl},
code = #{code},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE system_menu
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
status = #{map.status},
name = #{map.name},
parentId = #{map.parentId},
nodeOrder = #{map.nodeOrder},
nodeLevel = #{map.nodeLevel},
menuUrl = #{map.menuUrl},
code = #{map.code},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO system_menu ( creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status, name, parentId, nodeOrder, nodeLevel, menuUrl, code ) VALUES ( #{map.creator}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.status}, #{map.name}, #{map.parentId}, #{map.nodeOrder}, #{map.nodeLevel}, #{map.menuUrl}, #{map.code} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM system_menu
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{lastModifier} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
AND name like CONCAT('%', #{name} , '%')
AND parentId like CONCAT('%', #{parentId} , '%')
AND nodeOrder like CONCAT('%', #{nodeOrder} , '%')
AND nodeLevel like CONCAT('%', #{nodeLevel} , '%')
AND menuUrl like CONCAT('%', #{menuUrl} , '%')
AND code like CONCAT('%', #{code} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
